title: Registration Confirmed
message: Your registration for Tech Summit 2025 has been confirmed. We look forward to seeing you at the event!

title: Session Change
message: Please note that the 'AI in 2025' session has been moved to Ballroom A and will now start at 10:00 AM.

title: Abstract Accepted
message: Congratulations! Your abstract 'Machine Learning for Medical Diagnostics' has been accepted for presentation at Tech Summit 2025.

title: Presentation Materials Due
message: Please submit your final presentation materials for 'Machine Learning for Medical Diagnostics' by June 1, 2025.

title: New Session Added
message: A new workshop 'Hands-on with ChatGPT' has been added to the schedule. Limited seats available.
